casebody.data:
Richard MICKMAN, Respondent
v.
Elaine MICKMAN, Petitioner Richard Mickman, Respondent
v.
Elaine Mickman, Petitioner No. 678 MAL 2017
No. 679 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 28, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 28th day of March, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Application for Leave for Petitioner to Answer/Reply to Respondent's Counterstatement to Petitioner's Petition for Allowance of Appeal are DENIED.

The Application for Reconsideration and Clarification of October 19, 2017 IFP Denial Order is DENIED.

Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
